name: video-social-bookmark-chrome-extension
content_security_policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' http://localhost:3000 https://localhost:3000 'unsafe-eval'; connect-src http://localhost:3000 https://localhost:3000 https://video-social-bookmark-develop.herokuapp.com; style-src * 'unsafe-inline' 'self' blob:; img-src 'self' data:;
